paper.title: Financial time series forecasting using support vector machines
paper.abstract: Support vector machines (SVMs) are promising methods for the prediction of financial time-series because they use a risk function consisting of the empirical error and a regularized term which is derived from the structural risk minimization principle. This study applies SVM to predicting the stock price index. In addition, this study examines the feasibility of applying SVM in financial forecasting by comparing it with back-propagation neural networks and case-based reasoning. The experimental results show that SVM provides a promising alternative to stock market prediction. (C) 2003 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究支持向量机在股票价格指数预测中的应用，虽然涉及金融市场，但并未明确指出其应用于衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等特定领域。
